metadata.name: Potential Perl Reverse Shell Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the perl binary with the "-e" flag and common strings related to potential reverse shell activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/perl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fdopen(')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::socket::inet')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('socket')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('connect')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('open')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('exec')))

output.summary: Detects execution of the perl binary with the "-e" flag and common strings related to potential reverse shell activity
